lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Robins has sought bankruptcy protection since August 1985 following a flood of lawsuits relating to its intrauterine Dalkon Shield, alleged to have caused uterine perforations, sterility, spontaneous abortions and death.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: American Home products never disclosed details of the proposed acquisition bid but analysts speculated that American Home would provide about 1.5 billion dlrs for a separate trust fund to handle the liability claims.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Robins said the claims are invalid because they are duplicates, the claimant is claiming injury from a product other than the Dalkon shield, claimants did not complete court-required questionnaires by June 30, 1986, or the claims were made beyond the April 30, 1986 deadline.
